text: vyaktamāya teḷivukaḷumāyi mump yūsuph niṅṅaḷuṭe aṭutt vannu. appēāḷ addēhaṁ keāṇṭuvanna sandēśaṅṅaḷil niṅṅaḷ sanśayiccukeāṇṭēyirunnu. addēhaṁ maraṇamaṭaññappēāḷ niṅṅaḷ paṟaññu: “iddēhattinuśēṣaṁ allāhu iniyeāru dūtaneyuṁ ayakkukayē ille”nn. ivvidhaṁ atiruviṭunnavareyuṁ sanśayālukkaḷeyuṁ allāhu vaḻikēṭilākkunnu
